summary:
The Security Council, 
Noting with regret the death of Judge Antônio Augusto Cançado Trindade on 29 May 2022, 
Noting a vacancy in the International Court of Justice for the remainder of the term of the deceased Judge, 
Noting the date of the election to fill the vacancy shall be fixed by the Security Council, 
Decides the election to fill the vacancy shall take place on 4 November 2022 at a meeting of the Security Council and General Assembly at its seventy-seventh session.
